_meta.description: This file contains a serialized version of schema entities for drift.

sql.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "transactions" ("txid" TEXT NOT NULL, "version" INTEGER NOT NULL, "size" TEXT NOT NULL, "vsize" TEXT NOT NULL, "locktime" INTEGER NOT NULL, "vin" TEXT NOT NULL, "vout" TEXT NOT NULL, "blockhash" TEXT NULL, "height" INTEGER NULL, "confirmations" INTEGER NULL, "time" INTEGER NULL, "blocktime" INTEGER NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("txid"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "wallet_metadatas" ("id" TEXT NOT NULL, "master_fingerprint" TEXT NOT NULL, "xpub_fingerprint" TEXT NOT NULL, "is_encrypted_vault_tested" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_encrypted_vault_tested" IN (0, 1)), "is_physical_backup_tested" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_physical_backup_tested" IN (0, 1)), "latest_encrypted_backup" INTEGER NULL, "latest_physical_backup" INTEGER NULL, "xpub" TEXT NOT NULL, "external_public_descriptor" TEXT NOT NULL, "internal_public_descriptor" TEXT NOT NULL, "signer" TEXT NOT NULL, "signer_device" TEXT NULL, "is_default" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_default" IN (0, 1)), "label" TEXT NULL, "synced_at" TEXT NULL, "birthday" TEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "labels" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "label" TEXT NOT NULL, "reference" TEXT NOT NULL, "type" TEXT NOT NULL, "origin" TEXT NULL, UNIQUE ("label", "reference"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "settings" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "environment" TEXT NOT NULL, "bitcoin_unit" TEXT NOT NULL, "language" TEXT NOT NULL, "currency" TEXT NOT NULL, "hide_amounts" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("hide_amounts" IN (0, 1)), "is_superuser" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_superuser" IN (0, 1)), "is_dev_mode_enabled" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 CHECK ("is_dev_mode_enabled" IN (0, 1)), "use_tor_proxy" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 CHECK ("use_tor_proxy" IN (0, 1)), "tor_proxy_port" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 9050, "theme_mode" TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'system');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "payjoin_senders" ("uri" TEXT NOT NULL, "is_testnet" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_testnet" IN (0, 1)), "sender" TEXT NOT NULL, "wallet_id" TEXT NOT NULL, "original_psbt" TEXT NOT NULL, "original_tx_id" TEXT NOT NULL, "amount_sat" INTEGER NOT NULL, "created_at" INTEGER NOT NULL, "expire_after_sec" INTEGER NOT NULL, "proposal_psbt" TEXT NULL, "tx_id" TEXT NULL, "is_expired" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_expired" IN (0, 1)), "is_completed" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_completed" IN (0, 1)), PRIMARY KEY ("uri"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "payjoin_receivers" ("id" TEXT NOT NULL, "address" TEXT NOT NULL, "is_testnet" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_testnet" IN (0, 1)), "receiver" TEXT NOT NULL, "wallet_id" TEXT NOT NULL, "pj_uri" TEXT NOT NULL, "max_fee_rate_sat_per_vb" INTEGER NOT NULL, "created_at" INTEGER NOT NULL, "expire_after_sec" INTEGER NOT NULL, "original_tx_bytes" BLOB NULL, "original_tx_id" TEXT NULL, "amount_sat" INTEGER NULL, "proposal_psbt" TEXT NULL, "tx_id" TEXT NULL, "is_expired" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_expired" IN (0, 1)), "is_completed" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_completed" IN (0, 1)), PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "electrum_servers" ("url" TEXT NOT NULL, "is_testnet" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_testnet" IN (0, 1)), "is_liquid" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_liquid" IN (0, 1)), "priority" INTEGER NOT NULL, "is_custom" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_custom" IN (0, 1)), PRIMARY KEY ("url"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "electrum_settings" ("network" TEXT NOT NULL, "validate_domain" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("validate_domain" IN (0, 1)), "stop_gap" INTEGER NOT NULL, "timeout" INTEGER NOT NULL, "retry" INTEGER NOT NULL, "socks5" TEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("network"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "mempool_servers" ("url" TEXT NOT NULL, "is_testnet" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_testnet" IN (0, 1)), "is_liquid" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_liquid" IN (0, 1)), "is_custom" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_custom" IN (0, 1)), "enable_ssl" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 CHECK ("enable_ssl" IN (0, 1)), PRIMARY KEY ("url", "is_testnet", "is_liquid"));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "mempool_settings" ("network" TEXT NOT NULL, "use_for_fee_estimation" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 CHECK ("use_for_fee_estimation" IN (0, 1)), PRIMARY KEY ("network"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "swaps" ("id" TEXT NOT NULL, "type" TEXT NOT NULL, "direction" TEXT NOT NULL, "status" TEXT NOT NULL, "is_testnet" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_testnet" IN (0, 1)), "key_index" INTEGER NOT NULL, "creation_time" INTEGER NOT NULL, "completion_time" INTEGER NULL, "receive_wallet_id" TEXT NULL, "send_wallet_id" TEXT NULL, "invoice" TEXT NULL, "payment_address" TEXT NULL, "payment_amount" INTEGER NULL, "receive_address" TEXT NULL, "receive_txid" TEXT NULL, "send_txid" TEXT NULL, "preimage" TEXT NULL, "refund_address" TEXT NULL, "refund_txid" TEXT NULL, "boltz_fees" INTEGER NULL, "lockup_fees" INTEGER NULL, "claim_fees" INTEGER NULL, "server_network_fees" INTEGER NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "auto_swap" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "enabled" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 CHECK ("enabled" IN (0, 1)), "balance_threshold_sats" INTEGER NOT NULL, "trigger_balance_sats" INTEGER NOT NULL, "fee_threshold_percent" REAL NOT NULL, "block_till_next_execution" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 CHECK ("block_till_next_execution" IN (0, 1)), "always_block" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 CHECK ("always_block" IN (0, 1)), "recipient_wallet_id" TEXT NULL, "show_warning" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 CHECK ("show_warning" IN (0, 1)));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "bip85_derivations" ("path" TEXT NOT NULL, "xprv_fingerprint" TEXT NOT NULL, "application" TEXT NOT NULL, "status" TEXT NOT NULL, "alias" TEXT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("path"));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "recoverbull" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "url" TEXT NOT NULL, "is_permission_granted" INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK ("is_permission_granted" IN (0, 1)));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "prices" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "from_currency" TEXT NOT NULL, "to_currency" TEXT NOT NULL, "interval" TEXT NOT NULL, "market_price" REAL NULL, "price" REAL NULL, "price_currency" TEXT NULL, "precision" INTEGER NULL, "index_price" REAL NULL, "user_price" REAL NULL, "created_at" TEXT NOT NULL, UNIQUE ("from_currency", "to_currency", "interval", "created_at"));
